casebody.data:
IN RE: Maud Edwin Elliot INGRAM No. 431P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2018 Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C. Ms. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 14th of December 2017 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Halifax County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of January 2018."
